short_summary: Rental of hotel rooms and catering service
description: Rental of hotel rooms (up to 40 rooms per night) of conference rooms as well as a catering service within the framework of the Conference of Heads of Prosecuting Agencies (HoPAC) 2023 which will be held in Montreal from 6 to June 8, 2023. However, the room rental could be from June 4 to June 8, 2023.

full_summary:
================================

**Tender Announcement for HoPAC 2023 Conference in Montreal**

**Reference:** PW-22-01016817
**Solicitation:** 1000031554

**Background:**
The Public Prosecution Service of Canada is seeking a tender for the rental of hotel rooms and conference facilities in Montreal for the Heads of Prosecuting Agencies (HoPAC) 2023 Conference.

**Purpose:**
The rental requirement is for accommodations for up to 40 rooms per night and conference rooms to support the HoPAC 2023 Conference, to be held in Montreal from June 6 to 8, 2023. Optionally, the room rental could start from June 4, 2023.

**Key Information:**

* **Solicitation Method:** Competitive Bidding (Open Tendering)
* **Location:** Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)
* **Duty Station:** Montreal, Quebec
* **Delivery Location:** Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)
* **Trade Agreements:** Not Applicable
* **GSA Category:** X113A - Hotel, Restaurant Buildings, etc.
* **GSA Description:** Leasing of Hotel, Restaurant Buildings, etc.

**Selection Criteria:**
The tender will be evaluated based on criteria specified in the **Questions and Answers and Request for Proposal (RFP)** documents.

**Documents:**

* [Download the RFP document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/12/27c8d71076fc94582d5a500a1348f2c2/ppsc_-_rfp_1000031554_eng.pdf)
* [Download the Questions and Answers](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/29/26b65676f748abbe3519a097bfb425b0/1000031554_questions_answers_1_to_3.pdf)

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact:
Nathalie Simon
Public Prosecution Service of Canada
Email: nathalie.simon@ppsc-sppc.gc.ca
Phone: 613-716-2394

**Closing Date:** The tender closing date was January 3, 2023, at 13:00 Hours. Depending on the tender history, it's possible that this solicitation is expired.

Please note: This rewritten text was developed to help the technical writing community improve on the original text.
